data.text: @RichS_T1D This absolutely happened to me and as I have flare ups from long covid it comes back. 😭
@Shnoune I use a pump. Have been fine for many years. Only since my body clock wakes me up at 4am Iâ€™ve had spikes. I guess my body is trying to give me fuel for the day
@RichS_T1D Are you MDI? I find my early morning numbers are less susceptible to the foolishness of dawn phenomenon when I use Tresiba, dosed at night.

@RichS_T1D It's almost like having Covid has made you insulin resistance.  Urrhhhh bloody heck!!! Not looking forward to having it, since I think we all will eventually, triple - dipple vaxed. And I'm going on a cesspool (cruise) end of April.  Wish me luck!
